revised_title: Crystallography and Nucleation of Pearlite in Iron-Manganese-Carbon Alloys
tldr: The authors study the crystallography and nucleation of pearlite in iron-manganese-carbon alloys. They discover two distinct types of orientation relations between ferrite and cementite in pearlite nodules, which they attribute to different nucleation processes. The research provides a better understanding of the pearlite transformation and its implications for the formation of pearlite nodules.
